snippet: The Federal Trade Commission said that the company promised customers buy-one, get-one-free promotions but ended up charging higher fees.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission says Allstar Marketing Group, which sells 'As Seen on TV' products like the Snuggie, agrees to pay $8 million to settle charges it deceived customers with buy-one, get-one-free promotions.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission said that the company promised customers buy-one, get-one-free promotions but ended up charging higher fees.

headline.print_headline: Marketer of the Snuggie to Pay Fine for Misleading Ads
headline.main: Marketer of the Snuggie to Pay Fine for Misleading Ads
